affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 形容词后缀, "无…的, 不…的"

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 计数器，计算器；柜台；计算者

word_group.brief_definition: 无数戏剧爱好者；无数戏迷

bilingual.source: There are countless stars in the sky.
There are countless stars in the galaxy.
He has told me the story countless times.
bilingual.target: 他已经给我讲了无数的次这个故事。

bilingual.source: She helped countless people in her lifetime.
bilingual.target: 她在有生之年帮助了无数的人。

bilingual.source: Countless people visit this museum every year.
bilingual.target: 每年有无数的人参观这个博物馆。

bilingual.source: She has received countless awards for her work.
bilingual.target: 她因为她的工作获得了无数的奖项。

bilingual.source: Snowflakes are made up of countless ice crystals.
bilingual.target: 雪花是由无数的冰晶组成的。
孙中山的思想激励了无数的革命者。

bilingual.source: The cosmos holds countless galaxies, stars, and planets.
bilingual.target: 宇宙中有无数的星系、恒星和行星。

bilingual.source: The book has inspired countless readers around the world.
bilingual.target: 这本书激励了全世界无数的读者。

list.abstract: 《Countless》是韩国男子演唱组合SHINee演唱的一首歌曲，收录于其第六张正规专辑《The story of Light》合装版中，已于2018年9月10日发行。

yingyinNormal.en: Gaston! Stop it! Breath! Think of happy thoughts. Go back to the war. Bloods. Explosions. Countless widows. Widows. Yes, yes. That's it. That's it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 加斯顿！住手！深呼吸！想想高兴的事。回想下战场。血浆。爆炸。无数的寡妇。寡妇。是的，对。就是这样。就是这样。

yingyinNormal.en: I assumed as much, but never fear. Like the subordinate male protagonist in countless action movies who disappears half way through the second reel, I have returned to save the day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我猜也是，但别害怕，就像是无数的动作片里面那些次要男主角在影片放到一半时消失那样，我现在回来拯救世界。
数不清的同伴，被做实验，被屠杀..

yingyinNormal.en: However, that blue represents millions of dollars and countless jobs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 总之，那蓝色值几千万花费了数不尽的心血。

yingyinNormal.en: If you kill Trask, you will be creating countless more just like him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要是你杀了特斯拉克，只会让更多像他那样的人涌现。

yingyinNormal.en: It's not a flat surface at all. Instead, the petal is made up of countless nodules.
yingyinNormal.zh: 花瓣的表面根本一点都不平整，相反 上面布满了无数球形疙瘩。

yingyinNormal.en: Shao Lin monks are the inspiration for countless books, comics and movies like the Jedi Knights of Star Wars.
yingyinNormal.zh: 少林和尚是数不清的书籍、漫画和电影的灵感源泉，比如星球大战里的绝地武士。

yingyinNormal.en: I have read countless CVR transcripts of deceased pilots and I have significant accident investigation experience.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我读过无数牺牲机长的驾驶舱通话录音副本，也有相当多的事故调查经验。

yingyinNormal.en: You might want to shield your eyes from the sparkle of those trophies. How many? I have no idea. Countless, I'm sure. Thirteen.
yingyinNormal.zh: 小心不要被这些个金光闪闪的奖杯闪瞎了眼睛，有几座？我不知道，没数过...十三座。

yingyinNormal.en: I like to think that because of the child that I lost, because of the path that he sent me on, that I have saved countless other babies. Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想正是因为我失去的这个孩子，因为他让我选择了这条路，我才能救回数不胜数的孩子。是的。

yingyinNormal.en: Smaller continents were forming, creating countless new landscapes with new climates and environments, rising mountain ranges and dry inhospitable deserts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很多小块的大陆正在形成创造了无数新的地貌景观，新气候 新环境，山脉拔地而起，干涸荒芜的沙漠也随之形成。

yingyinNormal.en: We are grateful to the countless Americans who serve their communities in soup kitchens and shelters looking out for those who are less fortunate and lifting up those who have fallen on hard times.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们感恩无数在救济站和避难所服务于他们社区的国人，他们照料着不是那么幸运的人们，扶助着那些陷入困苦生活的人们。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 叙述；说明；重新计数
v. 对抗；阻碍；抵制；抵消；中和
n. 柜台；小圆板；计数器；计算器；对立物；对立面；反作用；艉突出体；外倾艉端；字谷；主跟；后帮

word_family.mean: v. 点…的数目；数；记数；把…考虑在内；包括；有意义；重要；指望；依靠；认为

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Countless</highlight> boards will attest that constrain firms from firing poorly performing, high-earning managers is a handbrake on boosting productivity and overall performance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无数的董事会将证明，限制公司解雇表现不佳的高收入经理是提高生产率和整体业绩的一种手段。

examination_example.sentence: The data of an individual there gains its value only when it is compared with the data of <highlight>countless</highlight> millions more.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在那里，只有与无数其他人的数据相比，个人数据才能体现价值。

examination_example.sentence: Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, and <highlight>countless</highlight> other social channels provide a quick and simple way to glimpse into a job candidate's personal life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Facebook、Twitter、LinkedIn和无数其他社交渠道提供了一种快速而简单的方式来初步认识求职者的个人生活。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 点…的数目；数；记数；把…考虑在内；包括；有意义；重要；指望；依靠；认为

examination_example.sentence: She reaches <highlight>countless</highlight> people with her online courses and exposes them to what they can accomplish using animation software.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她通过自己的在线课程接触到无数人，让他们了解自己使用动画软件可以完成的事情。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 柜台；小圆板；计数器；计算器；对立物；对立面；反作用；艉突出体；外倾艉端；字谷；主跟；后帮

word_family.mean: v. 点…的数目；数；记数；把…考虑在内；包括；有意义；重要；指望；依靠；认为

examination_example.sentence: Environmentalists become quite worried because a <highlight>countless</highlight> number of wasted masks have ended up in the sea!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 环保主义者非常担心，因为无数的废弃口罩最终被扔进了海里！

examination_example.sentence: While at the airport or on road trips, you’ll pass <highlight>countless</highlight> fast restaurants.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在机场或公路旅行时，你会路过无数家快餐店。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Countless</highlight> wild animals have been killed and thousands of people have lost their homes in the big fires.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这场大火中，无数的野生动物被杀死，成千上万的人失去了家园。
